author: daxian-dbw
body:
libpsrpclient.1.0.0-alpha01.nupkg and libmi.1.0.0-alpha02.nupkg are published to powershell-core. They need to be included in powershell to enable client-side PSRP on Linux/OS X.
libpsrpclient depends on libmi (`libmi (>= 1.0.0-alpha02)`), so libmi will be pulled from feed and published as well during the build.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Can we add some smoke test with it?

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @vors A test was added to make sure `New-PSSession` doesn't crash powershell like before. Can you please take another look?

title: Depend on the NuGet package 'libpsrpclient' to enable client-side PSRP on Linux and OSX
